#include <stdio.h>
#include "findLength.h"
#define MAXN 256
int array[MAXN][MAXN];

int main() {
	int N, r, c;
	int direction[4][2] = {{1,0},{1,1},{0,1},{-1,1}};
	scanf("%d", &N);
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
			for (int j = 0; j < N; j++)
					scanf("%d", &array[i][j]);
	scanf("%d%d", &r, &c);
	for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
			printf("%d\n", findLength(array, N, r, c, direction[i][0], direction[i][1]));
}
